articles.author: Jenna Fryer
articles.title: Indianapolis 500 kicks off with sold-out grandstands and thunderous chants - AP News
articles.description: A swarm of people poured through the gates at Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Some were shirtless, some wore American flag overalls, others checkered flag mini-skirts. The grandstands for the Indianapolis 500 are sold out for the first time since 2016 and IndyCa…
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS (AP) A swarm of people poured through the gates at Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Some were shirtless, some wore American flag overalls, others checkered flag mini-skirts.
